snippet: Kansas and Arizona filed suit Wednesday in federal court against the federal government, seeking court approval  to require proof of citizenship when people register to vote.
abstract: Kansas and Arizona file suit against federal government, seeking court approval to require proof of citizenship when people register to vote.
lead_paragraph: Kansas and Arizona filed suit Wednesday in federal court against the federal government, seeking court approval  to require proof of citizenship when people register to vote.

headline.main: Kansas: Suit Seeks IDs for Voting
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Suit Seeks Ids For Voting
